projectGridLines.title: 1) Software Team 2) Mechanical Team 3) Electrical Team
projectGridLines.description:
2. Brief of project/assignment

Software Team

React Native + Kotlin + Android

React Js / Next Js

Node Js + Mongo + Cloud + Power BI

Mechanical Team

Nonlinear material modeling and correlation with test data.

Active cooling in a portable battery pack.

Designing refrigerated systems for cooling batteries while fast-charging

Designing components for commercial use 2-wheeler (running >100km daily)

Optimizing charge-discharge cycles of batteries to maximize battery life

Working on designing mechanical structures for fully automated swap station catering to

multiple abuse cases

Work on designing a Swappable battery pack designed for rugged use cases

Electrical Team

Development of Firmware OTA update for BMS

RTOS based System Design for battery swapping and charging infrastructurePCB Design and testing for EV application

Components selection and Harness Design

Development of Soc soh algorithm for LFP based battery pack
